## Program.compile() method

Compiles the program.

This is fairly expensive, since it compiles both shaders, links the program and sets up all uniform buffers and textures.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
compile(): Promise<void>;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;void&gt;
